(In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 7/2001 [In the matter of M/s. Maharashtra Explosives Ltd. (In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 13/2002 [In the matter of M/s. Narenddra Dada Agro Industries Ltd. (In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NOS. 15/2002 & 16/2002 [In the matter of Shivaji Estate Live Stock and Farms Pvt. Ltd. (In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 2/2005 [In the matter of Marc Medicare Ltd. (In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 1/2008 [In the matter of Adhunik Grihanirman Vittiya Corporation Ltd. (In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 13/2010 [In the matter of Vidarbha Veneer Industries Ltd.(In Liqn.)] (3) cmp 5.1995+ AND COMPANY PETITION NOS.12/2012 & 14/2013 [In the matter of M/s. Shivmangal Ispat Pvt. Ltd. (In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 3/2010 [In the matter of M/s. Mahadeo Land Developers Pvt. Ltd.(In Liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 1/1995 [In the matter of Hariganga Cement Ltd.] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 11/1996 [M/s Market Analysts and Products Promoters, Mumbai vs. M/s Shree Niranjan Ayurved Bhavan Ltd.] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 14/1960 [In the matter of Laxmi Bank Ltd.] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 12/1961 [In the matter of M/s Laxmi Investment Co. Pvt. Ltd.] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 8/1961 [In the matter of Navbharat Trading Co. Ltd. (in liqn.)] AND COMPANY PETITION NO. 7/1995 [Anil M. Kale Vs. Orange City Builders Pvt. Ltd.] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Office Notes, Office Memoranda of Coram, Court's or Judge's orders appearances, Court's orders of directions and Registrar's orders --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Mr. Shriniwas Deshpande, Advocate for the Official Liquidator with Mr. Deepak Persoya, Official Liquidator CORAM : ANIL L. PANSARE, J. DATE : -02-2025 The Official Liquidator submits that in terms of order dated 31-1-2025 passed by this Court, he shall file annual statements in all the pending cases. He makes a request to not take action on the lapses committed while furnishing annual statements as the mistake was not intentional. He submits that he has recently joined. He assures to take corrective measures. On the basis of assurance so given, annual statements submitted by the Official Liquidator stand filed with a direction (4) cmp 5.1995+ to file fresh annual statements in accordance with the provisions of Companies Act, 1956 read with order dated 31-1-2025 passed by this Court. No further order is required.
